title: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Use of the Service
section1.point1: You agree not to misuse the service or attempt to harm others or the platform.

section2.title: 2. User Content
section2.content: You are responsible for any content you upload. We may remove content that violates laws or these terms.

section3.title: 3. Accounts
section3.point1: You are responsible for your account and activity on it.

section4.title: 4. Termination
section4.content: We may suspend or terminate your access if you violate these terms or abuse the service.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.content: g4o2.me is provided "as is." We are not liable for indirect damages, loss of data, or service interruptions.

section6.title: 6. Changes to These Terms
section6.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the app means you accept the updated terms.

section7.title: 7. Governing Law
section7.content: These terms are governed by the laws of your jurisdiction, unless otherwise required by applicable law.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have any questions or concerns, contact us at
